summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Holly Street, from a point 120 feet west of the west margin of 44th Avenue South to Rainier Avenue; by constructing sewers and side sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9021 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
